01/27/11 05:03 PM ET Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not make a bid for the GOP presidential nomination in 2012, telling supporters in a letter that he would rather serve the state of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence wrote, Still, Mike Pence is not officially jumping into the race for Indiana governor just yet. Donald Rumsfeld wrote that he never authorized waterboarding-- simulated drowning-- but he also called CIA interrogators who used the interrogation technique`` patriots, not criminals.'' The questioning of those in department of defence custody provided information that saved innocent American lives. I make no apology for that, he also wrote.
